i have a server that exposes some resources. I am supposed to build an api =
(in c ) to expose these resources. The responses are supposed to be in json=
. The idea is that they work cross platform, .net, whatever.

it appears th=
at putting stuff on top of curl might work. anyways, i am just looking for =
examples to get started to do this. What is the general idea and/or what wo=
rks when developing the sdk interface.

It seems that as far as a sdk is co=
ncerned things are no less complicated than SOAP? I mean, you still have to=
 support plenty of manipulation for specific objects/resources.

The questi=
on is how to abstract these resources. Is there a general paradigm or desig=
n pattern that works here?
